TopicTitle: I've been away since0.22, now I'm back. Quick question...

Articles.Content:
Hello!

Im a veteran of 0.20-0.22, I left it alone for most of 0.23.5. I had a good run of exuberant kerbals addiction but then migrated to other games (I know, shameful) and I wanted to go away and come back to some new, matured features.

Have to say I am super-impressed with what has been happening, I can't wait to get stuck back in!

My question is about the modding scene. I have scanned the various threads but it seems confused at the mo.

Where do people get their mods these days? Is "Curse" any good? There seem to be some "community" mod-hosting sites too? Do I need to frequent a bunch of places to keep track? How are people finding the move away from spaceport (I know it had its problems, I lost count of how many times I had to try to download KOSMOS...)?

Cheers!

Pete
Curse replaced the Spaceport, otherwise everything is as usual.
I follow the threads in the modding forums here and use the links in the threads - it assures me of always finding someone to punch if a mod fails.
Yeah curse is little like Spaceport without spam
